name: HMCameraStreamControlDelegate
desc: A protocol that gives the delegate updates on the camera stream.

items.name: func cameraStreamControlDidStartStream(HMCameraStreamControl)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the camera stream has started.

items.name: func cameraStreamControl(HMCameraStreamControl, didStopStreamWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the camera stream has stopped.
